snippet.title: RPG Quest #292: Digimon Anode/Cathode Tamer: Veedramon Version (WonderSwan Color) Part 1
snippet.description:
RPG Quest is my attempt to beat every English RPG released on consoles.

Playlist of all parts: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLv1e1NqeQU7tkoxjBOYsv8Ao1fcEv-2Bg

Game #292 is Digimon Anode/Cathode Tamer: Veedramon Version on WonderSwan Color, a Tactical RPG.

Released in Hong Kong, Digimon Anode/Cathode Tamer combines the 2 titular versions of the game, previously released on WonderSwan in Japan, and is the only WonderSwan Color RPG officially localized in English.

The Cathode version was selected for play, which puts you in the shoes of Ryo Akiyama, who's playing on his dad's PC when the power goes out.  Suddenly Agumon shows up on the PC, and a Digivice appears, which Agumon beckons Ryo to touch.  As he does so, Ryo is sucked into the Digimon world, where he needs to save them from the evil Milleniummon - a merging of Machinedramon and Kimeramon!

▶ Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/landail
